title: bg-title-3.webp
description: Twin brothers, one a cop, the other a criminal, become entangled in a web of deceit, loyalty, and betrayal, testing their bond and challenging their morals.

title: bg-title-2.webp
description: Betrayed by loved ones, Shiva's world shattered! Taking a new identity as Abhimanyu, he endures many trials for a bloody vengeance, carved with love.
